titles: An elegy on the much-lamented death of that late reverend and most learned divine, Dr. William Bates, minister of the gospel at Hackney, who departed this life on Friday the 14th of July, 1699. in the seventy third year of his age.
publisher: printed and sold by A[bigail]. Baldwin,
notes: Verse: "Flouds follow flouds, waves after waves arise:".
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
keywords: Bates, William, 1625-1699 --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
